original_title: L'incroyable histoire des machines à pluie
overview: This feature-length documentary lifts the veil on the mystery surrounding rain machines and the legends surrounding them. The making of rain has always fascinated. In Saguenay–Lac-Saint-Jean, these machines fuel daily conversations. Some deny their existence and mock those who believe in them. Others have theories, each more original than the next.
title: L'incroyable histoire des machines à pluie
